mapper.select: -- 查询仓库, 库区信息 -- A.inaaud001为Y视为线边仓, N视为仓库 SELECT DISTINCT A.INAA001 AS LOCATION_CODE, B.INAYL003 AS LOCATION_NAME, A.inaaud001 AS IS_LINE_WAREHOUSE, A.INAA008 AS LOCATION_DELETED FROM DSDATA.inaa_t a LEFT JOIN DSDATA.INAYL_T B ON A.INAA001 = B.INAYL001 WHERE B.INAYL002 = 'zh_CN' AND A.INAAENT = #{erpCode} AND A.INAA008 = 'Y' AND A.INAASITE = 'AM01'

SELECT A.INAB002 AS AREA_CODE, A.INAB003 AS AREA_NAME, B.INAA001 AS LOCATION_CODE, A.INAB006 AS AREA_DELETED FROM DSDATA.INAB_T A LEFT JOIN DSDATA.INAA_T B ON a.inab001 = b.inaa001 AND a.INABENT = b.inaaent AND a.inabsite = b.inaasite WHERE A.INAB003 IS NOT NULL AND A.INAB006 = 'Y' AND A.INABENT = #{erpCode} AND A.INABSITE = 'AM01'
